verses.text: Now the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* gathered \w together|strong="H0622"\w* their \w armies|strong="H4264"\w* to \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*, and were gathered \w together|strong="H0622"\w* at \w Shochoh|strong="H7755"\w*, which \add belongeth\add* to \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and \w pitched|strong="H2583"\w* between \w Shochoh|strong="H7755"\w* and \w Azekah|strong="H5825"\w*, in \w Ephes-dammim|strong="H0658"\w*.\f + \fr 17.1 \ft Ephes-dammim: or, the coast of Dammim, called Pas-dammim\f*

And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* and the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* were gathered \w together|strong="H0622"\w*, and \w pitched|strong="H2583"\w* by the \w valley|strong="H6010"\w* of \w Elah|strong="H0425"\w*, and set the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* in \w array|strong="H6186"\w* \w against|strong="H7125"\w* the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*.\f + \fr 17.2 \ft set…: Heb. ranged the battle\f*

And the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* on a \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* on the one side, and \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* on a \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* on the other side: and \add there was\add* a \w valley|strong="H1516"\w* between them.

¶ And there went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* a \w champion|strong="H0376"\w* out of the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, \w named|strong="H8034"\w* \w Goliath|strong="H1555"\w*, of \w Gath|strong="H1661"\w*, whose \w height|strong="H1363"\w* \add was\add* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* and a \w span|strong="H2239"\w*.

And \add he had\add* an \w helmet|strong="H3553"\w* of \w brass|strong="H5178"\w* upon his \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, and he \add was\add* \w armed|strong="H3847"\w* with a \w coat|strong="H8302"\w* of \w mail|strong="H7193"\w*; and the \w weight|strong="H4948"\w* of the \w coat|strong="H8302"\w* \add was\add* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w shekels|strong="H8255"\w* of \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*.\f + \fr 17.5 \ft armed: Heb. clothed\f*

And \add he had\add* \w greaves|strong="H4697"\w* of \w brass|strong="H5178"\w* upon his \w legs|strong="H7272"\w*, and a \w target|strong="H3591"\w* of \w brass|strong="H5178"\w* between his \w shoulders|strong="H3802"\w*.\f + \fr 17.6 \ft target: or, gorget\f*

And the \w staff|strong="H6086"\w* of his \w spear|strong="H2595"\w* \add was\add* like a \w weaver’s|strong="H0707"\w* \w beam|strong="H4500"\w*; and his \w spear’s|strong="H2595"\w* \w head|strong="H3852"\w* \add weighed\add* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w shekels|strong="H8255"\w* of \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*: and one \w bearing|strong="H5375"\w* a \w shield|strong="H6793"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him.

And he \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* and \w cried|strong="H7121"\w* unto the \w armies|strong="H4634"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Why are ye come \w out|strong="H3318"\w* to set \add your\add* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* in \w array|strong="H6186"\w*? \add am\add* not I a \w Philistine|strong="H6430"\w*, and ye \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* to \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*? \w choose|strong="H1262"\w* you a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* for you, and let him come \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to me.

If he be \w able|strong="H3201"\w* to \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* with me, and to \w kill|strong="H5221"\w* me, then will we be your \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*: but if I \w prevail|strong="H3201"\w* against him, and \w kill|strong="H5221"\w* him, then shall ye be our \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, and \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* us.

And the \w Philistine|strong="H6430"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I \w defy|strong="H2778"\w* the \w armies|strong="H4634"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*; \w give|strong="H5414"\w* me a \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, that we may \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*.

When \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* and all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* those \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w Philistine|strong="H6430"\w*, they were \w dismayed|strong="H2865"\w*, and \w greatly|strong="H3966"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*.

¶ Now \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \add was\add* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of that \w Ephrathite|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Beth-lehem-judah|strong="H1035"\w*, whose \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add was\add* \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w*; and he had \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*: and the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w went|strong="H0935"\w* among \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \add for\add* an old \w man|strong="H2204"\w* in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*.

And the \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w eldest|strong="H1419"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \add and\add* \w followed|strong="H0310"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* to the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*: and the \w names|strong="H8034"\w* of his \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* that \w went|strong="H1980"\w* to the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* \add were\add* \w Eliab|strong="H0446"\w* the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w*, and \w next|strong="H4932"\w* unto him \w Abinadab|strong="H0041"\w*, and the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w Shammah|strong="H8048"\w*.
And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \add was\add* the \w youngest|strong="H6996"\w*: and the \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w eldest|strong="H1419"\w* \w followed|strong="H1980"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*.

But \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* and \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* from \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* to \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* his \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* at \w Beth-lehem|strong="H1035"\w*.

And the \w Philistine|strong="H6430"\w* drew \w near|strong="H5066"\w* \w morning|strong="H7925"\w* and \w evening|strong="H6150"\w*, and \w presented|strong="H3320"\w* himself \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

And \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w David|strong="H1732"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* now for thy \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* an \w ephah|strong="H0374"\w* of \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w parched|strong="H7039"\w* \add corn\add*, and these \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w loaves|strong="H3899"\w*, and \w run|strong="H7323"\w* to the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* to thy \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*;

And \w carry|strong="H0935"\w* these \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w cheeses|strong="H2461"\w* unto the \w captain|strong="H8269"\w* of \add their\add* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*, and \w look|strong="H6485"\w* how thy \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \w fare|strong="H7965"\w*, and \w take|strong="H3947"\w* their \w pledge|strong="H6161"\w*.\f + \fr 17.18 \ft cheeses: Heb. cheeses of milk\f*\f + \fr 17.18 \ft of…: Heb. of a thousand\f*

Now \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, and they, and all the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \add were\add* in the \w valley|strong="H6010"\w* of \w Elah|strong="H0425"\w*, \w fighting|strong="H3898"\w* with the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*.

¶ And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* rose up \w early|strong="H7925"\w* in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, and \w left|strong="H5203"\w* the \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* with a \w keeper|strong="H8104"\w*, and \w took|strong="H5375"\w*, and \w went|strong="H3212"\w*, as \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w* had \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* him; and he \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w trench|strong="H4570"\w*, as the \w host|strong="H2428"\w* was going \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* to the \w fight|strong="H4634"\w*, and \w shouted|strong="H7321"\w* for the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*.\f + \fr 17.20 \ft trench: or, place of the carriage\f*\f + \fr 17.20 \ft fight: or, battle array, or, place of fight\f*

For \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* and the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* had put the battle in \w array|strong="H6186"\w*, \w army|strong="H4634"\w* \w against|strong="H7125"\w* \w army|strong="H4634"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w left|strong="H5203"\w* his \w carriage|strong="H3627"\w* in the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w keeper|strong="H8104"\w* of the \w carriage|strong="H3627"\w*, and \w ran|strong="H7323"\w* into the \w army|strong="H4634"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* and \w saluted|strong="H7592"\w* his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*.\f + \fr 17.22 \ft his carriage: Heb. the vessels from upon him\f*\f + \fr 17.22 \ft saluted…: Heb. asked his brethren of peace\f*

And as he \w talked|strong="H1696"\w* with them, behold, there came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* the \w champion|strong="H0376"\w*, the \w Philistine|strong="H6430"\w* of \w Gath|strong="H1661"\w*, \w Goliath|strong="H1555"\w* by \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, out of the \w armies|strong="H4634"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, and \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* according to the \w same|strong="H0428"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*: and \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \add them\add*.

And all the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, when they \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* the \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* from \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, and were \w sore|strong="H3966"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*.\f + \fr 17.24 \ft from…: Heb. from his face\f*

And the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Have ye \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* this \w man|strong="H0376"\w* that is come \w up|strong="H5927"\w*? surely to \w defy|strong="H2778"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* is he come \w up|strong="H5927"\w*: and it shall be, \add that\add* the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* who \w killeth|strong="H5221"\w* him, the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* will \w enrich|strong="H6238"\w* him with \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w riches|strong="H6239"\w*, and will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* him his \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, and \w make|strong="H6213"\w* his \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w free|strong="H2670"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* to the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* that \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* by him, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, What shall be \w done|strong="H6213"\w* to the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* that \w killeth|strong="H5221"\w* \w this|strong="H1975"\w* \w Philistine|strong="H6430"\w*, and taketh \w away|strong="H5493"\w* the \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* from \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*? for who \add is\add* this \w uncircumcised|strong="H6189"\w* \w Philistine|strong="H6430"\w*, that he should \w defy|strong="H2778"\w* the \w armies|strong="H4634"\w* of the \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*?

And the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* him after this \w manner|strong="H1697"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, So shall it be \w done|strong="H6213"\w* to the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* that \w killeth|strong="H5221"\w* him.

¶ And \w Eliab|strong="H0446"\w* his \w eldest|strong="H1419"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* when he \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w men|strong="H0582"\w*; and \w Eliab’s|strong="H0446"\w* \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* was \w kindled|strong="H2734"\w* against \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, and he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Why camest thou \w down|strong="H3381"\w* hither? and with whom hast thou \w left|strong="H5203"\w* \w those|strong="H2007"\w* \w few|strong="H4592"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*? I \w know|strong="H3045"\w* thy \w pride|strong="H2087"\w*, and the \w naughtiness|strong="H7455"\w* of thine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*; for thou art come \w down|strong="H3381"\w* that thou mightest \w see|strong="H7200"\w* the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*.
And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, What have I now \w done|strong="H6213"\w*? \add Is there\add* not a \w cause|strong="H1697"\w*?

¶ And he \w turned|strong="H5437"\w* from \w him|strong="H0681"\w* \w toward|strong="H4136"\w* \w another|strong="H0312"\w*, and \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* after the same \w manner|strong="H1697"\w*: and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w answered|strong="H1697"\w* him \w again|strong="H7725"\w* after the \w former|strong="H7223"\w* \w manner|strong="H1697"\w*.\f + \fr 17.30 \ft manner: Heb. word\f*

And when the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* were \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* which \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w*, they \w rehearsed|strong="H5046"\w* \add them\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*: and he \w sent|strong="H3947"\w* for him.\f + \fr 17.31 \ft sent…: Heb. took him\f*

¶ And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, Let no \w man’s|strong="H0120"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w fail|strong="H5307"\w* because of him; thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* will \w go|strong="H3212"\w* and \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* with this \w Philistine|strong="H6430"\w*.

And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, Thou art not \w able|strong="H3201"\w* to \w go|strong="H3212"\w* against this \w Philistine|strong="H6430"\w* to \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* with him: for thou \add art but\add* a \w youth|strong="H5288"\w*, and he a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w* from his \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, Thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w kept|strong="H7462"\w* his \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*, and there \w came|strong="H0935"\w* a \w lion|strong="H0738"\w*, and a \w bear|strong="H1677"\w*, and \w took|strong="H5375"\w* a \w lamb|strong="H7716"\w* out of the \w flock|strong="H5739"\w*:\f + \fr 17.34 \ft lamb: or, kid\f*

And I went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* him, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* him, and \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* \add it\add* out of his \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*: and when he \w arose|strong="H6965"\w* against me, I \w caught|strong="H2388"\w* \add him\add* by his \w beard|strong="H2206"\w*, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* him, and \w slew|strong="H4191"\w* him.

Thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* both the \w lion|strong="H0738"\w* and the \w bear|strong="H1677"\w*: and this \w uncircumcised|strong="H6189"\w* \w Philistine|strong="H6430"\w* shall be as \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of them, seeing he hath \w defied|strong="H2778"\w* the \w armies|strong="H4634"\w* of the \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* moreover, The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* that \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* me out of the \w paw|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w lion|strong="H0738"\w*, and out of the \w paw|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w bear|strong="H1677"\w*, he will \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* me out of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of this \w Philistine|strong="H6430"\w*. And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, and the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* be with thee.

¶ And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w armed|strong="H3847"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* with his \w armour|strong="H4055"\w*, and he \w put|strong="H5414"\w* an \w helmet|strong="H6959"\w* of \w brass|strong="H5178"\w* upon his \w head|strong="H7218"\w*; also he \w armed|strong="H3847"\w* him with a coat of \w mail|strong="H8302"\w*.\f + \fr 17.38 \ft armed David…: Heb. clothed David with his clothes\f*

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w girded|strong="H2296"\w* his \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* upon his \w armour|strong="H4055"\w*, and he \w assayed|strong="H2974"\w* to \w go|strong="H3212"\w*; for he had not \w proved|strong="H5254"\w* \add it\add*. And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, I \w cannot|strong="H3201"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* with these; for I have not \w proved|strong="H5254"\w* \add them\add*. And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w put|strong="H5493"\w* them off him.

And he \w took|strong="H3947"\w* his \w staff|strong="H4731"\w* in his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and \w chose|strong="H0977"\w* him \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w smooth|strong="H2512"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* out of the \w brook|strong="H5158"\w*, and \w put|strong="H7760"\w* them in a \w shepherd’s|strong="H7462"\w* \w bag|strong="H3627"\w* which he had, even in a \w scrip|strong="H3219"\w*; and his \w sling|strong="H7050"\w* \add was\add* in his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*: and he drew \w near|strong="H5066"\w* to the \w Philistine|strong="H6430"\w*.\f + \fr 17.40 \ft brook: or, valley\f*\f + \fr 17.40 \ft bag: Heb. vessel\f*

And the \w Philistine|strong="H6430"\w* \w came|strong="H3212"\w* \w on|strong="H1980"\w* and drew \w near|strong="H7131"\w* unto \w David|strong="H1732"\w*; and the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* that \w bare|strong="H5375"\w* the \w shield|strong="H6793"\w* \add went\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him.

And when the \w Philistine|strong="H6430"\w* looked \w about|strong="H5027"\w*, and \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, he \w disdained|strong="H0959"\w* him: for he was \add but\add* a \w youth|strong="H5288"\w*, and \w ruddy|strong="H0132"\w*, and of a \w fair|strong="H3303"\w* \w countenance|strong="H4758"\w*.

And the \w Philistine|strong="H6430"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \add Am\add* I a \w dog|strong="H3611"\w*, that thou \w comest|strong="H0935"\w* to me with \w staves|strong="H4731"\w*? And the \w Philistine|strong="H6430"\w* \w cursed|strong="H7043"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* by his \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*.

And the \w Philistine|strong="H6430"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w Come|strong="H3212"\w* to me, and I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thy \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* unto the \w fowls|strong="H5775"\w* of the \w air|strong="H8064"\w*, and to the \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* to the \w Philistine|strong="H6430"\w*, Thou \w comest|strong="H0935"\w* to me with a \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and with a \w spear|strong="H2595"\w*, and with a \w shield|strong="H3591"\w*: but I \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to thee in the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of the \w armies|strong="H4634"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, whom thou hast \w defied|strong="H2778"\w*.

This \w day|strong="H3117"\w* will the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w deliver|strong="H5462"\w* thee into mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*; and I will \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* thee, and \w take|strong="H5493"\w* thine \w head|strong="H7218"\w* from thee; and I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* the \w carcases|strong="H6297"\w* of the \w host|strong="H4264"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* unto the \w fowls|strong="H5775"\w* of the \w air|strong="H8064"\w*, and to the wild \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*; that all the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* may \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that there \w is|strong="H3426"\w* a \w God|strong="H0430"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 17.46 \ft deliver…: Heb. shut thee up\f*

And all this \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w* shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that the
